volatile unsigned char image[8] 
 = { 0b11000011, 0b11111011, 0b11111011, 0b11000011, 0b11011111, 0b11011111, 0b11000011, 0b11111111 }; 


volatile unsigned char image_rotate[4][8] 
 = {
      { 0b11000011, 0b11111011, 0b11111011, 0b11000011, 0b11011111, 0b11011111, 0b11000011, 0b11111111 },
      { 0b11111111, 0b11111111, 0b00001101, 0b01101101, 0b01101101, 0b01100001, 0b11111111, 0b11111111 },
      { 0b11111111, 0b11000011, 0b11111011, 0b11111011, 0b11000011, 0b11011111, 0b11011111, 0b11000011 },
      { 0b11111111, 0b11111111, 0b10000110, 0b10110110, 0b10110110, 0b10110000, 0b11111111, 0b11111111 }
  };
